description.value: As you fire or hurl your weapon, it becomes a line of booming lightning. Make a ranged Strike with your ikon against a creature within your weapon's first range increment, or 30 feet, whichever is further. If the Strike is successful, the target and each creature within 15 feet of it must succeed at a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:resolve(@actor.system.attributes.classDC.value)|basic:true] save against your class DC or take @Damage[1d6[electricity],1d6[sonic]]{1d6 electricity damage and 1d6 sonic} damage from the mighty thunderclap of the weapon's impact; this damage increases to @Damage[2d6[electricity],2d6[sonic]]{2d6 electricity and 2d6 sonic} if you are 12th level, or @Damage[3d6[electricity],3d6[sonic]]{3d6 electricity and 3d6 sonic} if you are 17th level. Your ikon then returns to your hand.
